pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: American Radio Archives, Thousand Oaks Library Foundation
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Currently contains materials selected and organized by Corwin for inclusion during his lifetime, including correspondence, scrapbooks, radio and television scripts, motion picture screenplays, sound recordings, video recordings, photographs, business records and contracts, press clippings and ephemera. The bulk of the accessible materials documents Corwin's career in radio and television broadcasting, motion pictures, the theater and as an author and teacher, 1935-1990. As of 2005, the collection is partly arranged and described.
